Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-chips] <sg777> just to give you a brief update on what's happenening so far is, while testing for a 2 players I can see the message size up to 36KB, so I made changes to send/receive messages of size upto 64 KB in the code, in the front end by enabling debug mode(f12) you can see all the backend communications which are happening via front end client...earlier we have used socket read/write..but now since we are using websocket read/write almost in all API's the write logic needs to be changed....for that I'm rewriting the API's with rest_* names to suit to this...the rest_dev looks like a mess now...I'll clean it once this basic addition of all rest API's are done...from here on..I can see in this week I'll finish off writing all the rest API's...the tricky thing here is..now I'm also writing kind of state machine or parsing JSON messages on the front end , based on the method types the front end logic takes a call which messages should be fed to front end UI and which needs to be forwarded to whom at the back end....one can see the the what's been done by setting up the bet node and running thr front-end on localhost in debug mode on browser can see the communications..
